Reviews.Title: what a POS
Reviews.Author: Troglobyte
Reviews.Content: For the record, I didn't buy this product through amazon but I wanted to spread the word about the low quality of this system.I bought the first system and noted that the HDMI video output did not work.  The VGA output did and I browsed through the menu system to see if there was a video source control.  There was not.  I noted that the front panel buttons are HORRIBLE.  They lack any tactile feel and it is difficult to navigate the menus using these buttons.  In any event, I boxed the system up and returned it for another.Upon powering the 2nd system up, I noted that again the HDMI output didn't work.  The rear panel around the power input looked like it had shipping damage.  The VGA output showed a splash screen that would intermittently appear then disappear.  Upon wiggling the power input cable, the DVR would turn on/off...Boxed the unit up and returned it for a refund.Never even got a chance to check out the camera...This company is simply shipping untested "bricks"...don't expect them to be around for much longerTroglobyte
